about_the_game:
Fractal City™ is a puzzle and surviving game. Set in a mysterious and old city, it's an innovative new game and will offer gamers hours of unique gameplay.

The game is designed to change the way players approach, manipulate, and surmise the possibilities in a given environment; similar to how Portal®'s rooms innovated new ways to apprehend any given situation.

Players must solve physical puzzles and challenges by manipulating fractals to maneuvering objects, and themselves, through space.

Key Features:
- For fans of Portal and Dr Strange.
- Featuring gorgeous city landscapes from neo-baroque era.
- A short game focused on light puzzle solving and platforming.

Fractal City™ is a puzzle and surviving game. Set in a mysterious and old city, it's an innovative new game and will offer gamers hours of unique gameplay.

The game is designed to change the way players approach, manipulate, and surmise the possibilities in a given environment; similar to how Portal®'s rooms innovated new ways to apprehend any given situation.

Players must solve physical puzzles and challenges by manipulating fractals to maneuvering objects, and themselves, through space.

Key Features:

- Featuring gorgeous city landscapes from neo-baroque era.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB (AMD / NVIDIA / Intel HD Graphics).

name: Fractal City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB (AMD / NVIDIA / Intel HD Graphics).
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Fractal City™ is a puzzle and surviving game. Set in a mysterious and old city, it's an innovative new game and will offer gamers hours of unique gameplay.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
